metadata.description: The work in question (Martin & Walter III: 22913) has title: Déclaration de M. l'Archev^eque de Lyon en réponse `a la proclamation du département de Rh^one-et-Loire, du 15 nov. 1790, concernant l'exécution des décrets sur la constitution civile du clergé [5 décembre 1790]
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title is on the cover page. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Damaged, stained, and/or loose pages.
